overview: The true story of Mamie Till Mobley’s relentless pursuit of justice for her 14 year old son, Emmett Till, who, in 1955, was lynched while visiting his cousins in Mississippi.
tagline: Witness the power of a mother’s love.
title: Till

cast.name: Friedman Twinkies
cast.character: Roy Bryant Jr and Lamar Bryant

actors_characters.character: Roy Bryant Jr and Lamar Bryant
